name: Etched dichroic glass stud earings
description:
These are nice; they are made of a beautiful acid etched copper/red dichroic glass. That changes to a nice yelloy/gold/lime green colour depending on there angle they are kiln fired and cooled slowly to anneal the glass to give them strength and durability. They come on top quality sterling silver ear posts with comfort backs

Size approx. 10 mm

Point of interest, all my metal findings such as bails, earring bases, rings, etc are not fixed with super glues, epoxy’s. As these glues are not up to the job, a slight knock to the piece or after time the glue will fail and you’re missing your earring, cufflink etc. Believe me it has taken me years to find the right fixing agent, but at last I have and once I have cemented the piece onto its bail, cufflink it will not come off I guarantee it.

name: Bright purple/pink dichroic glass ear studs.
description:
These are nice; they are made of a stunning bright purple dichroic glass that changes to a nice soft pink depending on there angle They are kiln fired and cooled slowly to anneal the glass to give them strength and durability. They come on top quality sterling silver ear posts with comfort backs

Size approx. 10 mm

Point of interest, all my metal findings such as bails, earring bases, rings, etc are not fixed with super glues, epoxy’s. As these glues are not up to the job, a slight knock to the piece or after time the glue will fail and you’re missing your earring, cufflink etc. Believe me it has taken me years to find the right fixing agent, but at last I have and once I have cemented the piece onto its bail, cufflink it will not come off I guarantee it.

name: 925 Sterling Silver Real Leather Necklaces 18"
description:
These are nice they are top quality, the necklace is 1.5mm and in black round leather and the end pieces are 925 sterling silver NOT silver plated. The sterling silver end is 3.3mm at its thickest point so will fit most pendant bails.

Free shipping

name: Glass cat clock
description:
This clock is made up of 18 separate pieces of glass, all are hand cut and ground into shape. The eyes are made of purple dichroic glass, the collar is made of 18k gold that is fused into the glass. The body and ears are of a turquoise glass and the head and tail are of light red. It is then kiln fused and once cool I add the cats markings in liquid glass and fire it again to fuse the markings into the glass, its then cooled slowly to anneal the glass for strength and durability. Size approx. 14" x 5".

The clocks come with numbers in silver or gold you can choose just let me know but if you don’t like the numbers they will come off. I also do commission work check out my sold orders.

name: Dichroic glass patchwork pendant complete with knot and loop cord
description:
This fused dichroic glass patchwork pendant is made up of six separate pieces of glass. The base glass is black on top of base glass I have laid four separate pieces of dichroic glass, it then has a top coat of clear glass and fused in my kiln, the piece is cooled slowly to anneal the glass to give the piece strength and durability. It is securely fixed to a good quality silver plated bail.

Size 20x25mm

Point of interest, all my metal findings such as bails, earring bases, rings, etc are not fixed with super glues, epoxy’s. As these glues are not up to the job, a slight knock to the piece or after time the glue will fail and you’re missing your earring, cufflink etc. Believe me it has taken me years to find the right fixing agent, but at last I have and once I have cemented the piece onto its bail, cufflink it will not come off I guarantee it.
